Articles.Content: Okay, I installed BDArmoury about 4-5 months ago and since one update, I have had to go to the 'previous stable release' on the steam tab. I tried it today, after the 1.2 update, and the loading screen is stuck on Squad/Parts/Aero/fairings/fairingSize1/fairingSize1. I left it alone for almost an hour, and it STILL hasn't gotten off of the same thing. I am ready to chuck this thing out of the window, and into the lake. HELP ME!!!!!

6 hours ago, DarkOwl57 said:

Okay, I installed BDArmoury about 4-5 months ago and since one update, I have had to go to the 'previous stable release' on the steam tab. I tried it today, after the 1.2 update, and the loading screen is stuck on Squad/Parts/Aero/fairings/fairingSize1/fairingSize1. I left it alone for almost an hour, and it STILL hasn't gotten off of the same thing. I am ready to chuck this thing out of the window, and into the lake. HELP ME!!!!!

Hi there ... As with many mods for KSP, BDAc has not been updated for KSP v1.2 as of yet.

Real life has gotten in the way of BahamutoD taking care of BDA and his other mods so we at the BDAc Development Group are currently working on updating BDA Continued to KSP v1.2 in Baha's absence.

I refer you to our thread where you will be able to find support for your issue (although the issue as it stands is that BDAc doesn't work with 1.2 yet ... Please stand by ..............)

 

Edited October 15, 2016 by DoctorDavinci

5 hours ago, DoctorDavinci said:

Hi there ... As with many mods for KSP, BDAc has not been updated for KSP v1.2 as of yet.

Real life has gotten in the way of BahamutoD taking care of BDA and his other mods so we at the BDAc Development Group are currently working on updating BDA Continued to KSP v1.2 in Baha's absence.

I refer you to our thread where you will be able to find support for your issue (although the issue as it stands is that BDAc doesn't work with 1.2 yet ... Please stand by ..............)

 

Thank you very much. As it is currently 12:30 in the morning, I will refer to this in the morning.
